cards.headline: Clash of Clans
cards.subcopy: Join millions of players worldwide as you build your village, raise a clan, and compete in epic Clan Wars!

cards.headline: Genshin Impact
cards.subcopy: Step into Teyvat, a vast world teeming with life and flowing with elemental energy.

cards.headline: Subway Surfers
cards.subcopy: DASH as fast as you can!
